about.heading: Introduction of the Organization
about.content1: Mahamana Malaviya Mission is a national-level organization dedicated to spreading the ideals and thoughts of Bharat Ratna Pandit Madan Mohan Malaviya Ji. The Bihar Unit is a dedicated group of alumni from Bihar associated with Banaras Hindu University, along with individuals inspired by its ideals and committed to social service.
about.content2: This unit functions in alignment with the principles and guidance of the national mission. Our core objective is to propagate and practice the vision and nation-building philosophy of Malaviya Ji in every sphere of society.
about.missionText: To build a society where education is combined with strong moral values and patriotism, bringing positive and meaningful change in Bihar.

mahamana.heading: Mahamana Pt. Madan Mohan Malaviya Ji
mahamana.educationistDesc: Founder of Banaras Hindu University who transformed modern Indian education.
mahamana.freedomDesc: A great patriot and journalist who contributed to India's independence movement.
mahamana.culturalDesc: Promoted Sanatan values and worked for the purity of River Ganga.
mahamana.quote: If we want to make our nation great, we must build youth with strong character and patriotism.

objectives.heading: Our Areas of Work
objectives.educationDesc: Providing free materials to underprivileged children and organizing educational camps and lecture series.
objectives.sportsDesc: Promoting sports culture, discipline, and leadership through tournaments.
objectives.socialDesc: Blanket distribution, flood relief, and assisting underprivileged families during needs.
objectives.cultureDesc: Preservation of Hindi language and Indian traditions.
objectives.future_schoolDesc: Establishing a value-based educational institution in the name of Mahamana Ji.

philosophy.title: Our Core Philosophy
philosophy.text: Mahamana Malviya Ji believed that education is not merely a means of acquiring knowledge but the foundation of character building and nation building. The Bihar Unit embraces this philosophy wholeheartedly.

activities.heading: Activities by Bihar Unit
activities.jayantiDesc: Annual celebration on 25 December with seminars and discussions.
activities.campsDesc: Guidance and encouragement programs for talented and needy students.
activities.reliefDesc: Active participation in social service and relief work across Bihar.
activities.conventionDesc: Recently, the 15th National Convention was organized at IIT Patna.
